summary: Request to support Bun runtime for Temporal workers. User encountered multiple issues when attempting to run Temporal workers with Bun: hook initialization failures and core-bridge panics due to hash table capacity overflow in the native bindings.
userImpact: Developers cannot use Temporal workers with Bun runtime despite Bun's performance advantages and HTTP2/gRPC support being available.
rootCause: Core-bridge native bindings have compatibility issues with Bun's v8 sandbox environment, causing hash table capacity overflow and worker initialization failures when hooks are enabled.
workaround: Commenting out the createHook code block temporarily resolves the initial error but breaks core-bridge functionality entirely.
keyQuote: Since bun provide many out-of-box features and better performance than node.js, It would be great if temporal sdk can support bun worker.
